Memberships
Lake Bernadette is a Semi-Public golf course.  That means we do have more public play than member play but, we do offer competitive membership pricing for those golfers who are local and enjoy meeting and playing in many different events.
The rate schedule is as follows:
Initiation fee & application: $500.00
(one time non-refundable, non transferable fee)
We offer 3 Membership types:
1) Cart Fee Member – ($12/ 18 holes; $7/ 9 holes)
per person each time you play
2) Trail Fee- (using your own personal cart)
3) Cart Included Member- (using a Lake B cart each round)
We offer Single and Family Memberships.
We offer Yearly Memberships or 6 Month Memberships.  Yearly Memberships may be paid quarterly or receive a 7% discount for 1 time Yearly payment.
6 month memberships must be paid in full.
Yearly memberships:
Single Cart Fee Member – $1500                           Family Cart Fee Member- $2300
Single Trail Fee Member- $2400                             Family Trail Fee- $3100
Single Cart Included Member- $2800                    Family Cart Included – $4000
Seasonal memberships (6 months- any consecutive 6 months)
Single Cart Fee Member – $1200                           Family Cart Fee Member- $1800
Single Trail Fee Member- $1800                             Family Trail Fee- $2300
Single Cart Included Member- $2100                    Family Cart Included – $3000
** 7% sales tax will be added to membership
Men’s Association plays Monday and Friday at 9:00 AM.
Ladies Association plays Wednesday at 8:30 AM.
Friday Scramble plays 9 holes every Friday at 3:00 PM during the winter (October- March).
2 player 9 hole Scramble offered from April – October with a 5:30 Shotgun Start.
4 player 9 hole Scramble offered from April – October with a 5:30 Shotgun Start.
*Guests of members are required to observe the green fee rate at the time of play
End of main content

News And Events
BOOK YOUR NEXT TOURNAMENT AT LINKS OF LAKE BERNADETTE!
Make sure you check out the great facilities at Links of Lake Bernadette for any of your upcoming event needs.  We would be honored to host your golf tournament, corporate outing, wedding, or banquet.  Our spacious clubhouse and friendly staff will make your next event the talk of the town!  You can be sure to be satisfied with our homemade food both daily and for all events and parties.
For more information please call the pro shop at
813.788.7888
.
